item.title: What's behind the enormous pop in shares of media meme stock Newsmax
item.description: Bob Pisani breaks down what's really going on with the new meme stock.

item.title: Trump tariffs live updates: President makes final decision on reciprocal duties
Trump Media shares drop after warning the president's trust and other insiders could sell stock
item.description: Insiders and major stakeholders, including the Donald J. Trump Revocable Trust, can sell stock "from time to time," the company disclosed in a filing.

item.title: Trump says reciprocal tariffs will 'start with all countries,' rejects narrower launch
item.description: Some Trump administration officials have suggested that the reciprocal tariffs would be focused on a handful of countries with large U.S. trade imbala...

item.title: The 'Dirty 15' percent: Some countries will take a harder hit from Trump's tariffs
item.description: Trump has pointed to America's trade deficits as he argues that virtually all trading partners are "taking advantage" of the U.S.
